meanings: Noun (극장에서 하는) 쇼, (특히 춤과 노래가 포함되는) 공연물 (→floor show, roadshow)

vlive.korean: 그리고 켈리 클락슨 쇼한 거 알겠지? And they know Kelly Clarkson had a show? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
vlive.english: And they know Kelly Clarkson had a show?

vlive.korean: [형아 자랑] '쇼! 챔피언'에서 1등 한 거 모르세요? 아이돌 중에서? [Bragging about SOOBIN] won first place among idol singers on "Show Champion?" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Bragging about SOOBIN] won first place among idol singers on "Show Champion?"

vlive.korean: "쇼 미 더 비니혀니"? "Show me the Binnie, Hyunie"? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
저도 '자니 윤 쇼'라든지 - '자니 윤 쇼'는 조금... Or "Johnny Yoon Show". - That's a bit... 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
vlive.english: Or "Johnny Yoon Show". - That's a bit...

vlive.korean: 전... 출근... '더쇼' 첫 출근을 얘기하시는 건가? Do you mean my first day of "THE SHOW"? 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕하세요 시즈니!! 제노에요진짜 잠깐 하려고 하는데.. 제노가 보고싶으면 들어오세요!! 이제 시작합니다
vlive.english: Do you mean my first day of "THE SHOW"?

examples.korean: There is plenty of fizz and sparkle in the show. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 쇼는 활기와 생기가 넘쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The show was filmed on location in New York. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 쇼[프로]는 뉴욕에서 로케이션으로 촬영되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The show was filmed on location in New York. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: Everyone was roped in to help with the show. Add to Wordbook
